roleset.name: to deliver a lecture

example.name: lecture about
example.text: [*] Stretching his arms in his silky white shirt and squeaking his black shoes , he lectures a visitor about the way [*0*] [*] to sell American real estate [*T*-1] and boasts about his friendship with Margaret Thatcher 's son .

about the way [*0*] [*] to sell American real estate [*T*-1]

example.name: lecture for
example.text: In an extraordinary mix of cultures and church - state powers , Rep. Robert Dornan ( R. , Calif . ) lectured his fellow Roman Catholics -- including Mr. Florio -- for [*-1] having the `` chutzpah '' [*0*] [*] to disagree with the hierarchy of their church on abortion [*T*-2] .
example.arg: In an extraordinary mix of cultures and church-state powers
his fellow Roman Catholics -- including Mr. Florio --
for [*-1] having the `` chutzpah '' [*0*] [*] to disagree with the hierarchy of their church on abortion [*T*-2]

example.name: lecture on
example.text: Partners lecture on how [*] to form corporations , draft agreements and defend clients against unwanted tender offers [*T*-1] .
example.arg: on how [*] to form corporations , draft agreements and defend clients against unwanted tender offers [*T*-1]

example.name: non-prepositional Arg2
example.text: [` ` When you 're in the groove [*T*-1] , you see every ball tremendously , '']-2 he lectured [*T*-2] .
